Change Log
==========

0.0.1 (25/01/2021)
-------------------
- First Release

0.0.2 (29/01/2021)
-------------------
- Made Every First Character Of The Characteristics Uppercase

0.0.3 (29/01/2021)
-------------------
- Made A Command Called 'get_help()' Which Shows The Description Of The Package In Your Output
